sentences.en: He switched the control to the answer-play mode and waited for the tape to rewind.
sentences.cn: 他把控制键转换到回答－播放模式，然后等待倒带。

sentences.en: Heat is a mode of motion.
His mode of doing business is offensive to me.
sentences.cn: 他干事情的方式叫我很不喜欢.

sentences.en: His mood of deep pessimism cannot have been leavened by his mode of transport—a black cab.
sentences.cn: 他极度悲观沮丧，而他的代步工具——一辆黑色的出租车，丝毫不能舒缓这一情绪。

sentences.en: Living separately from parents after marriage is all the mode.
sentences.cn: 现在非常流行婚后与父母分开住.

sentences.en: My letter will convey some idea of my mode of life.
sentences.cn: 我的信将使你了解到一些我的生活方式.

sentences.en: Page Mode shows headers, footers, footnotes and page numbers.
sentences.cn: 页面模式可以显示页眉、页脚、脚注和页码。

sentences.en: Set the monitor to 256 colour mode.
sentences.cn: 把显示器调成256色彩模式。

sentences.en: Suddenly, the narrator speaks in his most rhetorically elevated mode.
sentences.cn: 突然，解说员开始用高昂煽情的语调解说起来。

sentences.en: The bicycle reigned supreme as Britain's most popular mode of transport.
sentences.cn: 当时自行车是英国最流行的交通工具。

sentences.en: the most efficient mode of transport
Their main mode of subsistence is hunting.
This is the autor's peculiar mode of expression.
sentences.cn: 这是那位作家所特有的一种表达方式.

sentences.en: To get out of the ‘auto’ mode on the camera, turn the knob to ‘M’.
sentences.cn: 将按钮转到M，可退出相机的“自动”模式。

sentences.en: Wearing jeans is out of mode at present.
Why do you still dress in an old - fashioned mode?
sentences.cn: 你为什么还穿款式陈旧的衣服?

sentences.en: Zooming is not possible while in macro mode.
sentences.cn: 在微距模式下不可能实现变焦。

words.tran_cn: 莫代尔（一种新型纤维素纤维）
形式，形态；程序；物理疗法；主要的感觉

phrases.tran_cn: 正常模式；标准振荡方式；自然振荡；固有状态
运行方式；运行模式；执行方式
系统模式，系统方式；系统状态

trans.tran_cn: 方式，状况，时尚，风尚，调式，模式
trans.tran_en: a particular way or style of behaving, living or doing something
